name: Cues App
description: Get quick data regarding film, television, and theater production activity in New York City. Select a NYC borough and at the flip of a card, filter through date ranges and discover the most popular location and time of year for the dramatic arts' exclusive use of NYC properties.

name: Sassy Landing Page
description: A single-page React-app using Sass and CSS-Grid. My Github Repo README details a 2-hour lesson plan that I designed for my engineering students. I focused on a small set of features that Sass offers to frontend developers.

name: Will-Do App
description: Write down what you want to do and then do it with this user-friendly feature-rich app. Built with full CRUD to facilitate your editorial desires and hand-made draggable tasks for prioritizing your future.

name: Room
description: A purely frontend responsive CSS Grid-based landing page w/ a Bootstrap carousel. My solution to an intermediate level frontendmentor.io challenge.

name: Ashlea A. Morgan (Website)
description: Ashlea is a Neuroscientist, Ph.D Candidate, and Writer. This website establishes her professional brand in these areas. The site is responsive to mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.

name: The Poem Club
description: 'Poem Club'. A community-driven app for wordsmiths and lovers of poetry. I am actively collaborating with web developer, Lia Kapanadze and UX Designer, Adam Lempel to build this app.

name: Gig-A-Bit
description: 'Gig-A-Bit'. The talent-board app for artistic individuals and small groups. Register and post your art, project ideas and/or portfolio to be seen by talent-seekers online.

name: Instacart-Costco
description: 'Instacart-Costco'. A re-creation of Instacart's website. Proposes a layout that enhances the navigation, personalization, flow and accessibility of the site.

name: World Tour
description: 'World Tour' allows users to take a satellite journey to both familiar and foreign lands of Earth. You can randomly teleport or get specific in your search for regional data.
